revised_title: Analyzing the Reconnexion of Lines of Force in Rotating Spheres and Cylinders
tldr: The author investigates the reconnection of magnetic lines of force in a solid conducting sphere or cylinder when it suddenly starts rotating in an initially uniform magnetic field. An analytic solution is obtained, showing that lines of magnetic force reconnect to form closed loops during the transient phase. The behavior of the system is explored for all conductivities, and numerical examples and approximate expressions are provided for the limiting cases of large conductivity and small length scales.
